what: Cast List from Wes Anderson Films
title: Cast List from Wes Anderson Films
text: wesandersoncast lightweight R package provides tidy dataset actors appearing films directed Wes Anderson. includes film’s title, release year, runtime, worldwide box office takings — sourced Wikidata. dataset ideal demonstrations, tutorials, exploration network relationships filmography trends using tidyverse.

title: Cast List from Wes Anderson Films
Cast List from Wes Anderson Films
text: “Castello Cavalcanti”, “Cousin Ben Troop Screening Jason Schwartzman”, “Hotel Chevalier”, short version “Bottle Rocket” included. “Wonderful Story Henry Sugar”, “Rat Catcher”, “Swan” box office results produced Netflix. “Phoenician Scheme” released May 2025. time publishing CRAN, box office figures available. updated data released. find errors data, encourage correct Wikidata — ’s incredible community-driven resource.

title: Cast List from Wes Anderson Films — wes_actors
text: dataset actors appearing films directed Wes Anderson. Includes film title, actor name, release date, duration, worldwide box office takings.

text: tibble 5 variables: film Film title actor Actor name release_date Date first screening box_office_usd Worldwide box office takings USD duration_period Duration film hh:mm:ss

title: Cast List from Wes Anderson Films — wes_actors
Cast List from Wes Anderson Films — wes_actors
code: dplyr::count(wes_actors, actor, sort = TRUE) #> # A tibble: 353 × 3 #> # Groups:   film, actor [353] #>    film          actor                              n #>    <chr>         <chr>                          <int> #>  1 Asteroid City Aaron Ziobrowski                   1 #>  2 Asteroid City Adrien Brody                       1 #>  3 Asteroid City Adrián Corpa Fernández             1 #>  4 Asteroid City Aimee Mullins                      1 #>  5 Asteroid City Ainhoa Aldanondo                   1 #>  6 Asteroid City Alejandro García Aparicio          1 #>  7 Asteroid City Alejandro Urbina Escalona          1 #>  8 Asteroid City Alicia San Lorenzo                 1 #>  9 Asteroid City Alvaro Olivas Marques              1 #> 10 Asteroid City Ana Isabel Comendador Martínez     1 #> # ℹ 343 more rows
